Clean_Text: Customer: My internet is not working. Agent: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Let me help you.
Customer: Why double charge? Agent: I apologize. Checking billing now.
Customer: Service is bad. Agent: I understand your frustration and will assist you.
Customer: Hello. Agent: Hello! How can I help you today?
Customer: Refund please. Agent: Sure, I will process your refund.
